title: Just playing normal game and got dc'ed  my internet is working fine but whats  going on??
body: Any other people experiencing same problem?

replies.body:
Thanks for the reports guys - we're currently looking into what's happening and will update as soon as we can.

EDIT: 

We'll track and update this issue in this thread: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/RF70PdWb-game-start-game-disconnect-issues-17032016
can I get my lp back, cause this ain't right

I cannot start the game as well... 
I tried to start/open up new game but failed... (i am sorry my teammates) 
I was not able to start new game same problem as when i got disconnected.

Same for me, stomping other team, two of us got DC.  Ran speedtest, connection is fine, gf could spectate the game I painfully couldn't get back into.  Team went on to win 3v5 because we were so ahead but I got afk so no win and lost IP.  

On my 6th attempt at promos, this is really unfun.
Will loss prevention be turned on?

Thanks for the quick reply!!!
We are counting on you!!! :D

Game has been finished and I am back online lol
Lets see if i can play
tried but failed... cannot start the game from the beginning

Yes happened to me. just killed most of enemy team in teamfight was disengaging as jinx, then stopped being able to move, jhin ulted and killed me (said attempting to reconect though i everyone was still moving and ping etc so wast REALLY DCed) then after not being able to do any inputs eventually restart and could not get back in (still cant)
RECONNETED
Jesus 2 games in a row but my nets fine get reported for afk quality

ik i have had the same problem i thought it was a one time thing and now im about to lose two games of lp and ill derank cause of it



please riot i need this fixed i am deranking cause of it and i was positive in both these games please please please
can i not get a ban for getting dced
same here
foolish me tried another ranked happened 10 minutes in again i cant rejoin
its happening again now!?!! come on fixed the problem!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{champion:30}}

Was happening yesterday too and the "loss forgiven" button still hasn't even been turned on... 
Is anyone located in ACT? The issue seems to be consistent with players in the region.
Yep can't connect to my ranked in the ACT, iinet.
it is everywhere not just ACT
just got given an abandon and loss of LP -.- game wouldnt let me reconnect, even though the game was won. would have put me on my promo as well thanks rito for your excellent servers

Yep. Was in the middle of a ranked match. Asked my mate to see if he could join a custom and it seems he could.
All these Australian ISPs seem to be having an issue. Can anyone in NZ using Orcon say whether it's happening to them as well? Not sure if it's isolated to just that or not, tho
Just got back into game now
cant connect was winning the game and suddenly the game crash and failed to connect.  I did a speedtest.net and everything is working fine. what is going on?!{{champion:119}}
This is fucked, i was playing my last game to get into promotion and I get dc'd out of it. I can't rejoin and I don't want to lose lp :'( RIOT DO SOMETHING
same here, I got dc'ed and cant reconnect

What ISP are you guys with? 

IINET / Internode / Adam?
Internode.... + in speedtest.net  it is iinet
Seems to be an issue with iinet customers? same happened here and a friend.
oh.... WTF    yea  i am with Internode, which is using iinet ISP  damn it!
IINET same problem. Disgusting.

Yes, same issue but ranked. Logged out and in to the client as well, no problem logging in, but 'failed to connect' when trying to rejoin the game.

Oh, look, the game ended, so I can see the score screen to check how much LP I lost.
same here......

I guess we all in the same boat... 
Is there a maintenance or something?
